notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected areas of damage and related density  in Jama city, Manabi Province, Ecuador. Located at approximately 100 km south of the 16 April 2016 Muisne earthquake mainshock epicenter and using a WorldView-2 satellite image acquired 02 May 2016 and a WorldView- 2 image acquired 02 December 2013. UNITAR-UNOSAT created a damage  site density index for affected areas in the city of Jama. The analysis  revealed a total of 151 potentially damaged structures of which 105 are destroyed, 34 severely damaged and 12 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
